alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:08PM CDT until June 14 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NOXUBEE...NORTHEASTERN KEMPER AND EASTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 208 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mashulaville, or 13 miles west of Macon, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Macon and Shuqualak around 220 PM CDT. Paulette around 230 PM CDT. Cooksville around 235 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
